pages.text: With $(item)the Momobible$(), you can do rituals in order to give yourself health, heal your insomnia, or do other things. Each ritual needs a stamped momobible page that will be fed to the ritual table.

pages.title: The Momobible
pages.text: Right-click to extract a blank page, used for crafting passages.

pages.title: Momo's Ritual Table
pages.text: They are found in cult locations such as the Momotheists Cathedral. They are used for rituals.
The health ritual gives you health. The sleep ritual heals your insomnia. The speculose ritual gives you speculose biscuit !
Right-click with these ritual passages on a $(item)Momo's Ritual Table$() (with the $(item)ritual object$()) to activate the ritual.

pages.title: Ritual related objects
pages.text: Ritual stamps, ritual passages, and the ritual table, inside a Momotheists Cathedral.
